alert.note: Alert for Ozark; Stone; Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 2:52AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Ozark, Taney and southern Stone Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 252 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Taneyville to near Forsyth to near Hollister to 6 miles south of Kimberling City. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Branson, Lake Taneycomo, Table Rock State Park, Table Rock Lake, Bull Shoals Lake, Hollister, Kissee Mills, Taneyville, Table Rock, Theodosia, Kirbyville, Pontiac, Blue Eye, Coney Island, Sundown, Powersite, Protem, Brownbranch, Lampe and Rueter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for southwestern Missouri.
